page.title: 04NESTON PARKGATE C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: Parkgate County Primary School was {opened}in{1968.}It replaced the Infant School (now a private house called The Old Schoolhouse) which had about 40 children on roll. Today there are {202 children (121 boys and 81 girls). { 94 children}(aged 8-11) were asked how many schools they had attended {since the age of five. 53 children have attended only{1 school.}16 have attended more than 2 schools. -------------------------------------- * SCHOOLS *.....CLASS....* TOTAL * * ATTENDED * 6 : 5 : 4 * CHILDREN * *------------------------------------* *{ 1 }*{19}:{16}:{18}* {53 }* * 2 * 7 : 10 : 8 * 25 * * 3 * 6 : 2 : 1 * 9 * * 4 * 1 : 2 : 1 * 4 * * 5 * 0 : 1 : 0 * 1 * * 6 * 0 : 1 : 1 * 2 * --------------------------------------
